text: niccayamaka avvuril luttum irukkirare" enru (iprahim) kurinar; (atarku) avarkal atil iruppavarkal yar enpatai nankal nankarivom; enave nankal avaraiyum; avarutaiya manaiviyait tavira, avar kutumpattaraiyum niccayamakak kapparruvom; aval (alintu povoril oruttiyaka) tanki vituval enru connarkal
